title: Bought Riot Points
body:
I got riot points today  because of the sale thing. ( i got the 10$ pack with Paysera)
I still didnt get them, someone please help me!!!! And i can prove it with Pictures.

replies.body: I'm not familiar with any RP sales, and I wasn't able to find anything while looking up the account.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look.  We'll help you out!
